name: Crazy Wheel 2: Most Addictive Game
description:
Crazy Wheel 2 is a super-fun, color-matching challenge game that quickly challenges your brain and reflexes! You play by tapping the screen to rotate the wheel to the matching color of the rotating line. If you don't match the color before the line bounces, it's game over. It is developed to be easy to play and double hard to master. The game play format includes controlling two different wheels at the same time.

Features:

● Players have to tap on their display in order to match the arrow with colour.

● It may appear simple at first experience but competing against the last score could be challenging.

● This game is designed to examine the reflexes and the player may consume extra time to plan out proceedings.

● Progressing in the game is quite challenging but competing on the leader boards will be packed with fun. Each time finishing on a high score is likely to encourage the players on taking another shot.

● It helps in taking the gaming skills to a next level altogether. It is so much more than simply tapping the screen to match the dial with appropriate colour.

● Three different modes of game play have Three different set of functionalities and benefits for players.

● The head will get fuzzy while trying to control two different wheels at the same time.


Reasons which make it different:

For some players, the game would turn out to be an addiction. It won’t be easy to get
over this addiction early on and they are likely to be tempted for taking another shot.
Many users have labelled the game as useless while some people say it teaches mental balancing. For the young children, it is a great lesson and exercise in terms of teaching colour coordination. High levels of alertness are necessary to excel in the game. They’ll get rid of the boredom faced in waiting for the doctors, buses, or even trains at different situations.

Improves your right and left brain co-ordination play now
